content: That's a good point, having a sense of purpose can be beneficial, but it's important for it to be balanced with flexibility and the ability to adapt to change. Having a clear goal or sense of purpose can help guide decision making and focus efforts, but it can also be limiting or cause undue stress if taken too seriously or if it becomes rigid. Would you agree that having a balance between having a sense of purpose and being open to new opportunities is important in achieving personal fulfillment?
